22  public static function isAssociative($array) {
23  return (array_keys ( $array ) !== range ( 0, count ( $array ) - 1 ));
24  }
25 
33  public static function extractKeys($array, $keys) {
34  $result = [ ];
35  foreach ( $keys as $key ) {
36  if (isset ( $array [$key] )) {
37  $result [$key] = $array [$key];
38  }
39  }
40  return $result;
41  }
42 
50  public static function getValue($array, $key, $pos) {
51  if (array_key_exists ( $key, $array )) {
52  return $array [$key];
53  }
54  $values = array_values ( $array );
55  if ($pos < sizeof ( $values ))
56  return $values [$pos];
57  }
58 
66  public static function getRecursive($array, $key, $default = null) {
67  if (array_key_exists ( $key, $array )) {
68  return $array [$key];
69  } else {
70  foreach ( $array as $item ) {
71  if (is_array ( $item )) {
72  return self::getRecursive ( $item, $key, $default );
73  }
74  }
75  }
76  return $default;
77  }
78 
79  public static function getDefaultValue($array, $key, $default) {
80  return $array [$key] ?? $default;
81  }
82 
90  public static function save($array, $filename) {
91  $content = "<?php\nreturn " . self::asPhpArray ( $array, "array", 1, true ) . ";";
92  return UFileSystem::save ( $filename, $content );
93  }
94 
95  public static function asPhpArray($array, $prefix = "", $depth = 1, $format = false) {
96  $exts = array ();
97  $extsStr = "";
98  $tab = "";
99  $nl = "";
100  if ($format) {
101  $tab = str_repeat ( "\t", $depth );
102  $nl = PHP_EOL;
103  }
104  foreach ( $array as $k => $v ) {
105  if (is_string ( $k )) {
106  $exts [] = "\"" . UString::doubleBackSlashes ( $k ) . "\"=>" . self::parseValue ( $v, 'array', $depth + 1, $format );
107  } else {
108  $exts [] = self::parseValue ( $v, $prefix, $depth + 1, $format );
109  }
110  }
111  if (\sizeof ( $exts ) > 0 || $prefix !== "") {
112  $extsStr = "(" . \implode ( "," . $nl . $tab, $exts ) . ")";
113  if (\sizeof ( $exts ) > 0) {
114  $extsStr = "(" . $nl . $tab . \implode ( "," . $nl . $tab, $exts ) . $nl . $tab . ")";
115  }
116  }
117  return $prefix . $extsStr;
118  }
119 
120  public static function asJSON($array) {
121  return json_encode ( $array, JSON_HEX_TAG | JSON_HEX_APOS | JSON_HEX_QUOT | JSON_HEX_AMP | JSON_UNESCAPED_UNICODE );
122  }
123 
124  public static function remove($array, $search) {
125  if (\is_array ( $search )) {
126  foreach ( $search as $val ) {
127  $array = self::removeOne ( $array, $val );
128  }
129  } else {
130  $array = self::removeOne ( $array, $search );
131  }
132  return array_values ( $array );
133  }
134 
142  public static function removeByKey($array, $key) {
143  if (isset ( $array [$key] )) {
144  unset ( $array [$key] );
145  }
146  return $array;
147  }
148 
149  public static function removeRecursive(&$array, $key) {
150  foreach ( $array as &$item ) {
151  if (array_key_exists ( $key, $item )) {
152  unset ( $item [$key] );
153  } elseif (is_array ( $item )) {
154  self::removeRecursive ( $item, $key );
155  }
156  }
157  }
158 
159  public static function removeByKeys($array, $keys) {
160  $assocKeys = [ ];
161  foreach ( $keys as $key ) {
162  $assocKeys [$key] = true;
163  }
164  return array_diff_key ( $array, $assocKeys );
165  }
166 
167  public static function removeOne($array, $search) {
168  if (($key = array_search ( $search, $array )) !== false) {
169  unset ( $array [$key] );
170  }
171  return $array;
172  }
173 
174  public static function update(&$array, $search, $newValue) {
175  if (($key = array_search ( $search, $array )) !== false) {
176  $array [$key] = $newValue;
177  }
178  return $array;
179  }
180 
186  public static function doubleBackSlashes(&$array) {
187  return array_walk ( $array, function (&$value) {
188  $value = UString::doubleBackSlashes ( $value );
189  } );
190  }
191 
192  private static function parseValue($v, $prefix = "", $depth = 1, $format = false) {
193  if (\is_numeric ( $v )) {
194  $result = $v;
195  } elseif ($v !== '' && UString::isBooleanStr ( $v )) {
196  $result = UString::getBooleanStr ( $v );
197  } elseif (\is_array ( $v )) {
198  $result = self::asPhpArray ( $v, $prefix, $depth + 1, $format );
199  } elseif (is_string ( $v ) && (UString::startswith ( trim ( $v ), '$config' ) || UString::startswith ( trim ( $v ), "function" ) || UString::startswith ( trim ( $v ), "array(" ))) {
200  $result = $v;
201  } elseif ($v instanceof \Closure) {
202  $result = UIntrospection::closure_dump ( $v );
203  } else {
204  $result = "\"" . \str_replace ( '$', '\$', $v ) . "\"";
205  $result = UString::doubleBackSlashes ( $result );
206  }
207  return $result;
208  }
209 
210  public static function iSearch($needle, $haystack, $strict = null) {
211  return array_search ( strtolower ( $needle ), array_map ( 'strtolower', $haystack ), $strict );
212  }
213 
214  public static function iRemove($array, $search) {
215  if (\is_array ( $search )) {
216  foreach ( $search as $val ) {
217  $array = self::iRemoveOne ( $array, $val );
218  }
219  } else {
220  $array = self::iRemoveOne ( $array, $search );
221  }
222  return array_values ( $array );
223  }
224 
225  public static function iRemoveOne($array, $search) {
226  if (($key = self::iSearch ( $search, $array )) !== false) {
227  unset ( $array [$key] );
228  }
229  return $array;
230  }
231 
232  public static function implodeAsso($array, $glue, $op = '=', $quoteKey = '"', $quoteValue = '"') {
233  $res = [ ];
234  foreach ( $array as $k => $v ) {
235  $res [] = "{$quoteKey}{$k}{$quoteKey}{$op}{$quoteValue}{$v}{$quoteValue}";
236  }
237  return implode ( $glue, $res );
238  }
239 
240  public static function toJSON($array){
241  $result=[];
242  foreach ($array as $k=>$v){
243  if(is_array($v)){
244  $v=self::toJSON($v);
245  }elseif($v!=null && UString::startswith($v, 'js:')){
246  $v=substr($v, 3);
247  }else{
248  $v='"'.$v.'"';
249  }
250  $result[]='"'.$k.'": '.$v;
251  }
252  return '{'.implode(',', $result).'}';
253  }
254 }
